channel.title: Special Attack Glitch
channel.description:
My special attack is glitchy, I've search through files in old servers etc. and remember seeing stuff about special attacks.
Is there a way I could take a file from a different server for special attack and place it in mine (with proper credits given of course).
If so, can you please specify which file that would be, as I forgot.
Thanks. After this my server is pretty much flawless :D except for walking through walls sometimes

item.title: Special Attack Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Duke_Nukem Duke Nukem
item.description:
@Duke_Nukem wrote:

For example, if I use D claws which take up 50% spec,

It will use the spec, but it will like freeze and stay at 100, then I can’t use it anymore.

But then a while later if I check it it will go down to like 5% then raise back up as it should, but freeze again.

Read full topic
